question: Which of the following statement is false regarding DNS?

answers.A: When launching an EC2 instance in a custom VPC, by default, it gets only a private DNS hostname
answers.B: When enableDnsHostnames is set to true, an EC2 instance in the VPC gets private DNS hostnames
answers.C: EC2 instance within a VPC can share a DNS name
answers.D: The enableDnsSupport parameter indicates DNS resolution is supported
answers.E: When launching a new EC2 instance inside a default VPC, by default, it gets a private DNS hostname
